title: (x) Three telecom typefaces - Verona, Modena, InterFace {Satya, Yves, Angel}
author: JazzyB

comments.content: Top two are custom designed by [Miles Newlyn](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miles%20Newlyn) for mobile phone operator 3.
Do you happen to know their names ? or online articles about them ?

I had seen these faces in Hutch advertisements here in India. Hutch is now Vodafone though.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1880_1167199647_3774.preview.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hutch_6420.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/asd_4620.jpg)

Sorry'boutthis, tonight's episode of 24 Season 6 was about to start. The names are Verona and Modena. Check any of [these threads](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=nl&q=site%3Atypophile.com+modena+verona&btnG=Zoeken&lr=).

Here's a link about the third one (Vodafone).

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130731214039/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case_studies/vodafone.html "http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case\_studies/vodafone.html")
